title: Albanian tave dheu (Baked liver with cheese)
ingredients: ['500g beef liver, diced', 'olive oil', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '5 red peppers, roasted and diced', '6 tomatoes, diced', '40g plain flour', '100g feta cheese', '200g ricotta cheese', '4 bay leaves', '220ml hot water Hot Water', '1 teaspoon chilli flakes', 'salt and pepper']
